content.prompt: Which of the following was the most direct effect of the African American migration shown on the graph between 1900 and 1929 ?

choices.label: The integration of the United States military
The cultural movement known as the Harlem Renaissance
The federal effort to support the integration of public schools
The loosening of restrictions on immigration to the United States

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
